info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:50PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A cold front with moderate snowfall will impact portions of Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater, northwestern Meagher, northwestern Beaverhead, northern Jefferson, southeastern Teton and western Cascade Counties through 1115 PM MST... At 945 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cold front near Garrison, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Snowfall, with visibility below one half mile at times will move through the Boulder, Helena and Cascade areas over the next hour. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, Cascade, Lincoln, East Helena, Fairfield, Fort Shaw, Montana City and Wisdom. This includes the some of the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 102 and 255 and Highway 200 between mile markers 66 and 133, along with Highway 12 between mile markers 29 and 72. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If traveling be prepared for quickly changing road conditions and poor visibility.
